attributes.name: Support Ticket
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Support Ticket card for customer issue tracking and resolution in the Boxel framework. This card should streamline customer support operations with efficient ticket management, automated workflows, and comprehensive tracking of customer interactions from initial contact through resolution.

## Core Fields

### Ticket Information
- **ticketNumber**: StringField - Auto-generated unique ID (format: TICK-YYYY-NNNNN)
- **subject**: StringField - Brief issue description
- **description**: MarkdownField - Detailed problem explanation
- **type**: StringField with enum: "question", "problem", "feature-request", "bug", "complaint"
- **status**: StringField with enum: "new", "open", "pending", "on-hold", "resolved", "closed"
- **priority**: StringField with enum: "low", "medium", "high", "urgent", "critical"
- **channel**: StringField - Email, chat, phone, social, web form

### Customer Information
- **customer**: linksTo(Customer) - Customer record
- **contactName**: StringField - Person reporting issue
- **contactEmail**: EmailField - Reply-to email
- **contactPhone**: StringField - Callback number
- **account**: linksTo(Account) - Customer account/company
- **customerTier**: StringField - Support level (Basic, Pro, Enterprise)
- **contractSLA**: linksTo(SLA) - Service level agreement

### Assignment & Routing
- **assignedTo**: linksTo(Agent) - Current support agent
- **team**: linksTo(SupportTeam) - Assigned team
- **previousAgents**: linksToMany(Agent) - Assignment history
- **escalationLevel**: NumberField - Current escalation tier
- **specialistRequired**: StringField - Technical expertise needed
- **language**: StringField - Customer's preferred language

### Timeline & SLA
- **createdDate**: DateTimeField - Ticket creation time
- **firstResponseTime**: DateTimeField - Initial agent response
- **resolutionTime**: DateTimeField - Issue resolved time
- **closedDate**: DateTimeField - Ticket closed time
- **slaDeadline**: DateTimeField - Required resolution time
- **businessHoursOnly**: BooleanField - SLA calculation method
- **pausedTime**: NumberField - Total time on hold

### Issue Details
- **category**: linksTo(IssueCategory) - Problem classification
- **subCategory**: linksTo(IssueSubCategory) - Specific issue type
- **product**: linksTo(Product) - Affected product/service
- **version**: StringField - Software/product version
- **environment**: StringField - Production, staging, development
- **severity**: StringField - Business impact level
- **affectedUsers**: NumberField - Number of impacted users

### Communication Thread
- **messages**: containsMany(TicketMessage) - All communications
- **internalNotes**: containsMany(InternalNote) - Agent-only notes
 - **attachments**: containsMany(FileAttachment) - Files and screenshots
- **linkedTickets**: linksToMany(Ticket) - Related issues
- **mergedTickets**: containsMany(MergedTicket) - Consolidated tickets

### Resolution Information
- **resolution**: MarkdownField - How issue was resolved
- **rootCause**: StringField - Underlying problem
- **knowledgeArticle**: linksTo(KBArticle) - Solution documentation
- **preventiveMeasures**: MarkdownField - Future prevention steps
- **customerSatisfaction**: NumberField - CSAT score (1-5)
- **feedbackComments**: MarkdownField - Customer feedback

## Required Component Cards

### TicketMessage Card
Create a separate TicketMessage card with:
- **messageType**: StringField - Customer, agent, system
- **sender**: linksTo(Contact) - Message author
- **recipient**: linksTo(Contact) - Message target
- **content**: MarkdownField - Message body
- **timestamp**: DateTimeField - Send time
- **channel**: StringField - Communication method
- **isPublic**: BooleanField - Customer visible
- **attachments**: containsMany(FileField) - Message files
- **readStatus**: BooleanField - Message viewed
- **sentiment**: StringField - Positive, neutral, negative

### IssueCategory Card
- **categoryName**: StringField - Category label
- **description**: StringField - Category definition
- **defaultPriority**: StringField - Suggested priority
- **defaultTeam**: linksTo(SupportTeam) - Routing rule
- **autoResponses**: containsMany(Template) - Canned replies
- **slaOverride**: contains(SLARule) - Custom SLA
- **escalationPath**: containsMany(EscalationStep) - Escalation chain

### SLA Card
- **slaName**: StringField - Agreement name
- **responseTime**: contains(TimeLimit) - First response requirement
- **resolutionTime**: contains(TimeLimit) - Resolution requirement
- **businessHours**: contains(Schedule) - Coverage hours
- **priorities**: containsMany(PrioritySLA) - Priority-specific limits
- **exclusions**: containsMany(SLAExclusion) - Pause conditions

## Computed Fields Logic

### Time to Resolution
Calculate elapsed time from creation to resolution, excluding paused time and non-business hours if applicable.

### SLA Status
Determine if ticket is within SLA, approaching deadline, or breached based on current time and SLA requirements.

### Customer Health Score
Aggregate ticket history, satisfaction scores, and issue patterns to assess customer relationship health.

### Agent Performance Metrics
Calculate average response time, resolution time, and satisfaction scores per agent.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a comprehensive ticket management interface:

**Header Section**
- Ticket number and status badge
- Priority indicator with color coding
- SLA countdown timer
- Quick actions: Reply, Assign, Escalate, Close
- Customer satisfaction indicator

**Main Content Area**
- **Conversation Thread**:
  - Chronological message display
  - Visual distinction for customer/agent/system
  - Inline attachments preview
  - Sentiment indicators
  - Time stamps and read receipts
  - Quick reply box
  
- **Ticket Details Panel**:
  - Subject and description
  - Category and classification
  - Product and version info
  - Related tickets
  - Tags and labels

**Sidebar Panels**
- **Customer Information**:
  - Contact details with quick actions
  - Account information
  - Recent ticket history
  - Purchase history
  - Preferred communication method
  
- **Assignment & Routing**:
  - Current assignee with avatar
  - Team assignment
  - Escalation path
  - Specialist consultation
  - Transfer history
  
- **Actions & Tools**:
  - Status change dropdown
  - Priority adjustment
  - Macro/template selector
  - Knowledge base search
  - Time tracking
  - Internal notes

**Activity Timeline**
- All ticket events chronologically
- Status changes
- Assignment changes
- SLA events
- Customer interactions

### Fitted View Layout
- Ticket number and subject
- Status and priority badges
- Assignee avatar
- Last update time
- SLA indicator
- Quick view hover

### Agent Dashboard View
- My tickets queue
- Team queue
- SLA warnings
- Performance metrics
- Quick filters

## Interactive Features

### Quick Actions
- One-click reply templates
- Bulk ticket operations
- Keyboard shortcuts
- Drag-drop file uploads
- Quick status updates

### Automation Rules
- Auto-assignment based on rules
- Escalation triggers
- SLA breach alerts
- Follow-up reminders
- Auto-close inactive tickets

### Collaboration Tools
- @mention other agents
- Request specialist help
- Share ticket via link
- Screen sharing integration
- Co-browsing capability

## Styling Requirements
- Clean support interface
- High contrast for readability
- Status color coding
- Priority visual indicators
- Mobile-responsive design
- Dark mode support
- Accessibility features
- Multi-language UI

## Validation Rules
- Ticket must have subject and description
- Customer contact required
- Priority must align with SLA
- Resolution required before closing
- Satisfaction survey for closed tickets
- Attachment size limits
- Message content filtering
- Escalation approval required

## Integration Points
- **Help Desk Systems**: Zendesk, Freshdesk, Intercom
- **CRM Platforms**: Salesforce Service Cloud, HubSpot
- **Communication**: Email, SMS, chat, social media
- **Knowledge Base**: Confluence, internal KB
- **Phone Systems**: VoIP, call center software
- **Analytics**: Support metrics dashboards
- **Monitoring**: System alerts and incidents
- **E-commerce**: Order and account data
- **Development**: Bug tracking systems
- **AI/Chatbots**: Automated responses

## Business Logic Requirements
- Intelligent ticket routing
- Automatic prioritization
- SLA calculation engine
- Escalation workflows
- Merge duplicate detection
- Customer sentiment analysis
- Response time optimization
- Workload balancing
- Holiday calendar integration
- Multi-timezone support
- Language detection
- Spam filtering
- VIP customer handling
- Compliance tracking
